item.description: KNOCKDOWN Grass Fire; INC#1088; 03:19PM; 4260 N Vineland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wQV9rC; Studio City; LAFD confirms 28 firefighters achieved extinguishment of the fire at 1616 hrs. No injuries or structure damage reported. CHP and DOT will remain on scene until it is safe for civilians to drive through affected area. ; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E108 E278 E6 E60 E86 T78; CH8; 17; Jennifer Middleton

Rubbish Fire; INC#1088; 03:19PM; 4260 N Vineland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wQV9rC; Studio City; At the intersection of Vineland and the Hollywood FY, callers report seeing smoke in the grassy area behind fire station 86. LAFD confirms slow moving 50 x 50 ft small grass fire burning. DOT and CHP assisting with traffic control in area. Small spot fires near the 170 FY are being controlled by units on scene, but are putting off smoke in the area. No damage to fire station 86 or any other structures.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E108 E278 E6 E60 E86 T78; CH8; 17; Jennifer Middleton

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1026; 04:02PM; 1313 N Vista St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GCWrKh; Hollywood; Full extinguishment of the blaze was achieved by the 44 firefighters on scene at approximately 1511 hrs. No injuries to civilians or LAFD personnel. ; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC18 BC5 E227 E261 E27 E41 E61 RA27 RA61 T27 T61; CH7; 14; Jennifer Middleton

Structure Fire; INC#1026; 02:47PM; 1321 N Vista St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MXxOdp; Hollywood; LAFD units arrived on scene to find a detached garage behind a one-story single-family dwelling with smoke showing from the garage. Garage fire impinging a tree and additional auto in rear of garage. Units are working aggressively to extinguish flames. No reports of injuries or additional structures being exposed by the blaze.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC18 BC5 E227 E261 E27 E41 E61 RA27 RA61 T27 T61; CH9; 14; Jennifer Middleton

Multi-Patient Traffic; INC#1287; 04:50PM; 6520 N Louise Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Gk123z; #LakeBalboa; Firefighters responded to a two-vehicle traffic collision, resulting in the assessment and care of 5 adult patients. Two patients in good condition declined hospital transport. Three patients were transported to a local hospital in moderate condition. LAPD Inc #3776. Nothing further. ; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E100 E290 EM14 EM15 EM17 RA100 RA73 RA83 RA872 T90; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

#GermainFire - Knockdown - Brush Fire; INC#1009; 06:00PM; 22200 W Germain St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lxLXC9; #Chatsworth; The well coordinated effort of 64 LAFD ground and airborne Firefighters, earlier joined by LACoFD and VCFD resources, have fully contained and controlled the "Germain Fire" wildfire in and near Chatsworth Park to two (2.0) acres of vegetation in rocky and remote terrain. No injury. No structure damage. LAFD Firefighters will remain at the scene tonight in a patrol status to monitor and extinguish hotspots and further establish a bare soil perimeter. The fire's cause remains under investigation.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC15 BC17 E104 E105 E106 E107 E28 E290 E296 E72 E87 E90 EM15 H4 H5 H6 HA4 HA5 HA6 HE1 RA96 T90 T96 + LACoFD + VCFD; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update #GermainFire Brush Fire; INC#1009; 03:44PM; 22200 W Germain St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lxLXC9; #Chatsworth; The railroad tracks in the Santa Susana Pass (Metrolink Ventura County Line, also used by Amtrak Pacific Surfliner and Union Pacific Railroad) have reopened to all freight and passenger train traffic between Chatsworth and Simi Valley. Follow @MetrolinkVC on Twitter ( https://twitter.com/MetrolinkVC ) for updated rail service information. The fire's cause remains under investigation.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC15 BC17 E104 E105 E106 E107 E28 E290 E296 E72 E87 E90 EM15 H4 H5 H6 HA4 HA5 HA6 HE1 RA96 T90 T96 + LACoFD + VCFD; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Brush Fire Forward Progress Stopped - #GermainFire - 05/23/2022 INC#1009

item.description: Update Forward Progress Stopped - #GermainFire - Brush Fire; INC#1009; 02:16PM; 22200 W Germain St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lxLXC9; #Chatsworth; The well coordinated response of LAFD, LACoFD and VCFD firefighters (all three agencies with both ground and air units assigned) has stopped forward progress of the "Germain Fire" at an estimated two (2.0) acres of vegetation in rocky terrain near the three agencies common border in and near Chatsworth Park. No injury. No structure damage. No evacuation. Firefighters are continuing to fully extinguish stubborn hotspots and create a bare earth perimeter to the fire. To protect both firefighters and the traveling public, railroad tracks in the Santa Susana Pass (Metrolink Ventura County Line / also used by Amtrak Pacific Surfliner and Union Pacific Railroad) will remain closed to all freight and passenger train traffic between Chatsworth and Simi Valley until further notice. Follow @MetrolinkVC on Twitter ( https://twitter.com/MetrolinkVC ) for rail service information. The fire's cause is under active investigation.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC15 BC17 E104 E105 E106 E107 E28 E290 E296 E72 E87 E90 EM15 H4 H5 H6 HA4 HA5 HA6 HE1 RA96 T90 T96; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update #GermainFire Brush Fire; INC#1009; 02:50PM; 22200 W Germain St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lxLXC9; #Chatsworth; The 64 LAFD ground and airborne Firefighters assigned are now joined by LACoFD (ground and air) and VCFD (ground) responders in actively battling stubborn flames at what is known as the "Germain Fire", involving vegetation in rocky terrain (no acreage update), at what is considered a Mutual Threat Zone near the three agencies common border in/near Chatsworth Park. No imminent structure threat. No formal evacuation. As a precaution, railroad tracks in the Santa Susana Pass (Metrolink Ventura County Line / also used by Amtrak Pacific Surfliner and Union Pacific Railroad) are being closed to all freight and passenger train traffic between Chatsworth and Simi Valley until the fire is controlled. Follow @MetrolinkVC on Twitter ( https://twitter.com/MetrolinkVC ) for rail service information.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC15 BC17 E104 E105 E106 E107 E28 E290 E296 E72 E87 E90 EM15 H4 H5 H6 HA4 HA5 HA6 HE1 RA96 T90 T96 + LACoFD + VCFD; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1009; 02:20PM; 22200 W Germain St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lxLXC9; #Chatsworth; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response with @LACoFD and @VCFD to one-quarter (0.25) acre light-to-medium brush burning slowly uphill in mild (5MPH) wind. No imminent structure threat.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E104 E106 E107 E28 E296 E72 E87 E90 EM15 H0D H0E RA96 T96 + LACoFD + VCFD; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey
